text: Punctoterebra teramachii is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Terebridae, the auger snails.MolluscaBase eds. (2020). MolluscaBase. Punctoterebra teramachii (R. D. Burch, 1965). title: Punctoterebra teramachii
